products.aiDescription: As a fashion-forward woman, you deserve to look and feel your best on any special occasion. The Teresa Draped Tulle Gown from THEIA, available at Saks Fifth Avenue, is the perfect choice for your next formal event. This stunning gown features layers of vibrant tulle and an elegant ruffled front, creating a show-stopping look that will turn heads. With a strapless design, concealed back zip, and seamed waist, this gown is both comfortable and flattering. The cascading front drape, front slit, and pooled hem add a touch of drama to this already stunning piece. Don't settle for anything less than the best - choose the Teresa Draped Tulle Gown for your next big event.

products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and sophisticated pair of shoes? Look no further than the Calvin Klein Women's Tegin Strappy Dress High Heel Sandals. These shoes are perfect for any fashion-forward woman looking to elevate her style. With an ultra high heel and a stylish square toe, these sandals are sure to turn heads. The barely there skinny straps across the toe and ankle add a touch of elegance to any outfit. Founded in New York in 1968, Calvin Klein has become a globally iconic brand that elevates everyday essentials to new heights. Shop now at Macy's and step up your shoe game!

products.name: Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum
products.brandedName: Skylar Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum
products.description: What it is: An irresistible, better-than-your-average-vanilla fragrance that is hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin and vegan. Fragrance story: Vanilla Sky is a rich and creamy gourmand scent. Pure vanilla shines through this fragrance with a unique addition of cappuccino for a delicious, not-too-sweet profile. Caramelized cedarwood lies at the base of the fragrance. Style: Warm, spicyNote:- Top: bergamot zest, sweet orange, cappuccino- Middle: pure vanilla, jasmine grandiflorum, cinnamon bark- Base: caramelized cedar, sheer amber, sandalwood 1.7 oz. Paraben-free; phthalate-free Hypoallergenic Safe for sensitive skin Cruelty-free Vegan Made in the USA Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC) certified, ensuring forest management that preserves biological diversity and benefits the lives of local people and workers Asian Owned/Founded
products.aiDescription: Introducing Skylar's Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum, a warm and spicy fragrance that is perfect for the modern woman. This gourmand scent features pure vanilla with a unique addition of cappuccino, creating a delicious and not-too-sweet profile. Cinnamon bark and caramelized cedarwood add depth to the fragrance, making it irresistible. This hypoallergenic and vegan perfume is safe for sensitive skin and is made in the USA. It is also cruelty-free and FSC certified, ensuring forest management that benefits local people and workers. With at least 30% sustainably sourced materials, this fragrance meets Nordstrom's Responsible Packaging criteria.

products.aiDescription: This Chiara Boni La Petite Robe Kate Slit-Detail Boatneck Gown, available at Saks Fifth Avenue, is the perfect addition to any woman's wardrobe. Made with a unique wrinkle-resistant textile and stretch fabric, this floor-length dress features a boatneck with slit detail, three-quarter sleeves, and front and back shaping darts. The faux-wrap skirt with ruffle accent and raw-edged hem add a touch of elegance. This step in and pull up style gown is about 63" from shoulder to hem and is made of polyamide/elastane. products.brandedName: Alaia Quilted Ballerinas, , - Black
products.description: PRODUCT NAME: Quilted Ballerinas PRODUCT CATEGORY: WOMEN, SHOES, FLAT SHOES, BALLERINAS Introducing the QUILTED BALLERINAS by ALAÏA - the epitome of elegance and luxury, designed for women who value refined style and comfort. These exceptional ballerinas feature a classic, rounded shape and a low profile, making them incredibly versatile. Made from VELVETY MATERIAL in a dominant black color, these ballerinas stand out with a quilted pattern that adds a unique charm. The central strap, fastened with a silver buckle, emphasizes their elegant character and functionality. The interior of the shoe is lined with light brown material, ensuring wearing comfort, while the label with the inscription "ALAÏA" serves as proof of the product's exclusivity. The high-quality rubber sole guarantees durability and comfort for daily use. In the attached photos, the ballerinas are styled with wide denim pants and a leather jacket, highlighting their versatility and ability to pair with various outfits. WHY SHOULD YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT? * Exclusive design by ALAÏA * Elegant quilted pattern * Comfortable interior lined with light brown material * Versatility and the ability to match different styles * High-quality materials: velvet, leather, and rubber

FOREVER BETTER: PUMA is always pushing to be better than we were yesterday. FOREVER BETTER is our commitment to reduce our environmental impact and work together towards a sustainable future. The shoe's upper is made with at least 20% recycled material.
